summary: Tested Attribute Icons feature on listing detail page. All features working correctly: green Ionicons (#2E7D32) displayed BEFORE attribute labels in both desktop and mobile views. Icons fetched from /api/attribute-icons/public endpoint (73 icons). Light green background (#E8F5E9) on icon boxes. Default icons shown for attributes without custom icons.
critical_code_review_comments: KeyDetailsSection component (lines 147-210) correctly uses getIconForAttribute() to fetch icons
ICON_COLOR constant (#2E7D32) is properly exported and used in both KeyDetailsSection and desktop details grid
useAttributeIcons hook properly caches icons globally with 5-minute TTL
Default icon fallback (information-circle-outline) works for attributes without custom icons
Icon boxes use light green background (#E8F5E9) with proper border-radius
context_for_next_testing_agent: Attribute Icons feature fully functional. Test listing ID: a43909ba-6022-430f-8170-b1af696d89da (Tesla Model 3 with auto_vehicles category). Icons display correctly on listing detail page for all attributes including: year, mileage, fuel_type, transmission, body_type, engine_size, color, doors, registered, make, model, seller_type, condition, category.

verified_features.desktop_view_details_icons: PASS - Icons visible in Details grid section
verified_features.mobile_view_details_icons: PASS - Icons visible in KeyDetailsSection component
